meanings.definition: A thought or suggestion as to a possible course of action.
meanings.sent1: She shared her ideas for the school project.
meanings.sent2: His ideas on how to improve the company were well-received.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a penguin wearing sunglasses made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her idea to plant flowers in old boots was truly creative.
meanings.sent5: The idea of a tree growing money captured everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The artist's ideas for the painting were inspired by nature.
meanings.sent2: His ideas about friendship are very heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking dog in a top hat is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her idea of time as a river flowing endlessly was profound.
meanings.sent5: The idea of a rainbow made of candy is so delightful.

meanings.sent1: His ideas about honesty are admirable.
meanings.sent2: She has strong ideas about social justice.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a cat running for president is funny.
meanings.sent4: Her idea of love as a warm blanket is comforting.
meanings.sent5: The idea of kindness as a superpower is truly inspiring.
